mapper.sql: img_seq as imgSeq ,origin_name as originName ,server_name as serverName ,img_type as imgType ,img_size as imgSize ,is_thumbnail as isThumbnail ,TO_CHAR(reg_dt,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') as regDt ,reg_id as regId
mapper.select: SELECT T1.*, T2.* FROM ( SELECT B.rnum as num, B.img_seq as imgSeq, B.origin_name as originName, B.server_name as serverName, B.img_type as imgType, B.img_size as imgSize, B.is_thumbnail as isThumbnail, DECODE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyy/mm/dd'),TO_CHAR(B.reg_dt,'yyyy/mm/dd') ,TO_CHAR(B.reg_dt,'hh24:mi') ,TO_CHAR(B.reg_dt,'yyyy/mm/dd')) as regDt, B.reg_id as regId FROM ( SELECT rownum as rnum, A.* FROM ( SELECT img_seq, origin_name, server_name, img_type, img_size, is_thumbnail, reg_dt, reg_id FROM image WHERE reg_id = #{searchWord} ORDER BY reg_dt DESC ) A WHERE rownum <= #{pageSize} * #{pageNum} ) B WHERE rnum >= ( #{pageSize} * ( #{pageNum} - 1 ) + 1 ) ) T1 NATURAL JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) as totalCnt FROM image WHERE reg_id = #{searchWord} ) T2

UPDATE image
SET is_thumbnail = 'y'
SET is_thumbnail = 'n'
WHERE img_seq = #{imgSeq}
